careers.title: Forensic Scientist
careers.whyThis: Forensic Scientist will help you build your Chemical Sciences and Physical Sciences from where you are now. To move towards Forensic Scientist you still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more knowledge in Chemical Sciences. Forensic Scientist is more of a future goal for you over the next few years. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Forensic Scientist now and understand what to work towards.
